members.joinCircumstances: Little Oars Jr. is the captain and founder of the Little Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Little Pirates Join Battle of Marineford
keyMoments.description: The Little Pirates, led by Little Oars Jr., arrive at Marineford as allies of the Whitebeard Pirates to help save Ace.
keyMoments.significance: The crew debuts as subordinate allies of Whitebeard, demonstrating the reach of his influence.

keyMoments.title: Commanders Showcase Abilities
keyMoments.description: The Whitebeard Pirates' division commanders demonstrate their combat prowess and Devil Fruit abilities in the battle.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the strength and coordination of Whitebeard's top commanders.

keyMoments.title: Jozu's Ice Block Attack
keyMoments.description: Division Commander Jozu demonstrates his incredible strength by hurling a massive iceberg at the Marines.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the physical might of Whitebeard's commanders.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a white mustache and crossbones behind it
